gameDetails.name: Crusader: The 8th Army's Winter Victory, Nov-Dec 1941
gameDetails.description:
Game 5 in The Gamers' Standard Combat Series. This game covers the 1941 British winter offensive against the Afrika Korps.

Contents
1 full-color 22"x34" map
280 counters
Series and game rulebooks
2 six-sided dice

Scale: Each turn represents 2 days, each hex 2.5 miles. Units range in size from Battalion through Brigade.  (Source: Game Rules).
